title: Vollmann Writes About Fukushima's 'Quiet Horror' In 'Harper's Magazine'
teaser: David Greene talks to writer William T. Vollmann, who has gained an almost cult-status for his immersion-style storytelling. Vollmann traveled to Japan's now defunct Fukushima nuclear power plant.
